questions.text: A good guy.  Has a pig named Shermany. Who is it?
In the episode "Totally Rad", who was the kids' coach for the skate-off?
questions.explanation:
Digit.

	Digit used to work for Hacker.

questions.text: In the episode "A Whale of a Tale", what is the whale's name?
questions.explanation:
Spout.

	Hacker reprograms Spout to destroy R-Fair-City.

questions.text: Her favorite color is yellow.  She has black hair. Who is it?
questions.explanation:
Jackie.

	Jackie is also 11 years old.

questions.text: Youngest member.  Likes Marc Anthony.  Has brown hair.
questions.explanation:
Inez.

	Inez is only 9 years old.

True.

	Delete's favorite movie is "The Wizard of Oz".

questions.text: A bird.  Likes the Dixie Chicks.
questions.explanation:
Digit.

	Digit wrote a book called "The Cyber Chef" by Digit Leboid.

questions.text: What are the names of the For Real kids?
questions.explanation:
Harry and Bianca.

	Bianca's favorite color is orange.  Harry's favorite color is blue.

Dr. Marbles

	Dr. Marbles' favorite movie is "Tron".

questions.text: Who wants to rule all of cyberspace?
questions.explanation:
Hacker.

	Hacker's favorite movie is "Who Framed Roger Rabbit".
